title: Navigating Retirement Amid Inflation, Volatile Markets, and Recession
description: Join Barron’s associate editor Reshma Kapadia and Christine Benz, director of personal finance and retirement planning for Morningstar, for practical advice on how those in or near retirement should be thinking about their portfolios, withdrawal rates and portfolios as inflation hits 40-year highs, stocks and bonds rack up losses and economists fret about recession.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
